forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of dense morning fog. Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of dense morning fog. Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 57F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 36F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 8C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 46F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 0C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 32F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 7C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 44F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 8C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 46F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 38F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 44F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 3C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 37F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 42F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low 1C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 34F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low around 0C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 31F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies with light rain and snow developing in the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies with light rain and snow developing in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mixture of rain and snow showers. Low 33F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.
